pages.title: Morbus Scythe
pages.text: $(l)Experiment Index: $()#53$(br2)$(l)Experiment Proposal: $()Using the power of the Morbus Essence, create a relic similar to those already known, but with the use of the Morbus' special properties. $(br2)$(l)Experiment Results: $()Success.

$(l)Morbus Scythe$() is the result of condensing $(l)Morbus Essence$() into a $(l)Netherite Hoe$(). If properly handled, the handler is able to consistently do broad attacks.$(br)Whenever a foe is attacked with this scythe, it'll earn a small amount of $(l)charge$().$(br)When fully charged, $(l)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use)$() to invoke a circle of Morbus Projectiles, prone to cause mild intoxication. Long-term effects are yet to be studied.
